Pony Trainer

Instructions

  1. Click "Find devices" to scan for nearby toys
  2. Click "Start" to begin listening, the app is now ready to use
  3. Click "Pause" if you want to pause the app

If you check "Save recordings", the browser will save all speech it detects and you can click "Download Recordings" to save your recordings to a Zip file.

Will this spy on my microphone?

No. This app only saves the last 1 second of audio, and it is never uploaded to a server. You have the choice of saving your recordings to your computer assist with development. If you are still unconvinced, you can turn off your internet after loading this page, and the app will continue to work.

Browser compatibility

Currently only Chrome and Chromium-based browsers like Edge are supported, HOWEVER Firefox and Safari support will be added later but you will have to run Intiface Desktop on your desktop, as neither of these browsers can interact with Bluetooth devices directly.
